titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: NHS Dental Services - Description

div.p: NHS Dental Services is an operating division of the NHS Business Services Authority.

NHS Dental Services (previously known as the NHS Business Services Authority Dental Services Division) pay dentists promptly and accurately. They also provide dental statistics and key information to national, regional and local NHS bodies.
For further information on NHS Dental Services, see the NHS Dental Services website at: NHS Dental Services.
